constituent: exhausted, tired, sickness, hospital, pelt, branch, ten, needle, crotch, hook
koohiiStory1: I picture an exhausted sick caveman snuggling up in a comfy pelt blanket.
koohiiStory2: Your body feels tired when you have a sickness. All you want to do is wrap yourself up in a nice warm pelt and get better.
kunYomi: つか.れる、-づか.れ、つか.らす
readingExamples: 疲らす (つか.らす), 疲れる (つか.れる)
words:
疲労(ひろう): fatigue, weariness
疲れ(つかれ): tiredness, fatigue
疲れる(つかれる): to get tired, to tire
